title: 🛑New Optimizer Tab Detected🛑
p1: It seems that you've opened Genshin Optimizer in another tab💞. GO is not intended to operate on multiple tabs📵, doing so can result in:

symptom.3: Upset stomach🤰 and frustruated Genshin Optimizer Devs😡.

p2: We've prevented this from happening by showing you this message📝. You now have the choice of either:

choice.1: Close this tab🔪, and use the new tab🆕.
choice.2: Close the new tab↩️, and once you are sure this is the one and ONLY tab🔂, you can refresh this page🔄.
